features:
Born on 01.04.60. Named the 1460. Over six decades, our 8-eye work boot has become iconic
Patent Lamper is a fine-grained leather, coated to give a high shine, glossy finish. Clean with a damp cloth and restore its shine with Dr. Martens Patent Cleaner
Flexible cemented sole construction for growing feet
Upper: 100% Coated Leather
Inner: 100% Textile
Sole: 100% PVC
Material This fine-grained leather is coated to give a high-shine, glossy finish.
Construction: The sole is cemented to the upper.
